attributes.action: All new build homes and offices should be built to include a solar solution.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government have an obligation to ensure that actions to safeguard it's population and future populations are taken.  
Our government has a target of reducing CO2 emissions by 80%, by 2050.  I would say our government needs to aim higher than that, we need to take action now and stop kicking the can down the road. Bring that target forward and show the world that we are in the business of environmental solutions and saving our planet, for future generations to enjoy.
attributes.background: The government should ensure that all new buildings include the provision of solar power and power storage, where practicable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584316
